about_the_game:
"Nightblood W: Cutthroat Wolf" is a cyberpunk-style action role-playing game. In this imaginary world full of future technology and dark forces, you will play the ambitious gang cadre Loreto Gustavo. Your goal is to challenge and eliminate the rebellious Frey Gang alone and find the traitors of the gang. This game uses a new operating system, which greatly simplifies the operation of the game. You can play it without complicated operations and easily enjoy the pleasure of action games. The game adopts a pixel style and has a high-speed action rhythm. The innovative hook lock skills and simple and refreshing combo combinations provide players with a rich combat experience. In addition, the game also provides a simple but rich equipment system, allowing players to choose equipment according to their preferences.

Rapid continuous slashing


Press the left mouse button continuously to launch multiple rapid attacks on the enemy without mercy.

Hook displacement attack


Use the mouse to aim at the enemy, then press the right button to use Sogus Raid to quickly chase the enemy. Holding down the right button can use bullet time, giving you more time to think about which target to attack

Advanced Attack Effect


Use the left key to attack 3 times, it will accumulate a floating sword additional attack, and then press the right key to attack the enemy to trigger, there are 3 effects. You can use this technique to make additional attacks on the enemy

Aerial combo


After using the right button to chase the enemy, use the left button to attack the enemy in a smooth mid-air combo

Active Equipment Slot


There are 2 active equipment slots. You need to press P to open the backpack and install the equipment into the corresponding slots. The initial keys are Q and E. In this game, you can obtain a large amount of equipment through exploration and challenges to enhance yourself. Use different equipment to match your own combat style. In addition, there are 2 passive equipment slots. Passive equipment can directly trigger attack effects through some key combinations
